constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 路径必须从起点 (1, 1) 到终点 (3, n)，且总共需要进行 n + 1 次移动，其中 n - 1 次水平移动和 2 次垂直移动。
constraints.formal: Path from (1, 1) to (3, n) with exactly n-1 horizontal and 2 vertical moves.

constraints.name: availability_constraint
constraints.description: 初始时，第一行和第三行的所有单元格是可用的，第二行的所有单元格是不可用的。通过使用特殊优惠，可以将第二行的某些单元格标记为可用。
constraints.formal: Initially, cells in the first and third rows are available, and cells in the second row are unavailable. Special offers can make cells in the second row available.

constraints.name: cost_constraint
constraints.description: 接受每个特殊优惠会减少 Dima 的分数，具体减少的分数由该优惠的成本决定。
constraints.formal: Accepting a special offer reduces Dima's score by the cost of the offer.

constraints.name: movement_constraint
constraints.description: Dima 只能向下或向右移动，即只能增加当前行或列的索引。
constraints.formal: Dima can only move down or right, increasing the current row or column index by 1.
